statements: SELECT id, location, date, moisture_level FROM Soil_Moisture_Data
SELECT location, date, moisture_level, id FROM Soil_Moisture_Data
SELECT date, moisture_level, id, location FROM Soil_Moisture_Data
SELECT moisture_level, id, date, location FROM Soil_Moisture_Data
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture_Data ORDER BY moisture_level DESC
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, AVG(moisture_level) AS avg_moisture FROM Soil_Moisture_Data GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_moisture DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND moisture_level < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE location LIKE '%garden%' OR location LIKE '%field%';
SELECT MAX(moisture_level) AS max_moisture, MIN(moisture_level) AS min_moisture FROM Soil_Moisture_Data;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data;
SELECT location, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE location = 'Field A';
SELECT * FROM farm_information ORDER BY farm_size DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_name FROM farm_information WHERE location = 'City X';
SELECT farm_name, farmer_name, farm_size FROM farm_information WHERE farm_size > 50;
SELECT location, date_collected FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY date_collected DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM farm_information WHERE location = 'California' AND farm_size > 50 ORDER BY farm_name ASC;
SELECT farm_id, farmer_name, farm_size, location FROM farm_information WHERE farmer_name LIKE 'J%' AND farm_size < 100 ORDER BY farm_id;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY location, date_collected ASC;
SELECT farm_name, farmer_name, farm_size, location FROM farm_information WHERE farm_size >= 50 ORDER BY farm_size DESC, farm_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT location, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT field_name, crop_type FROM farm_fields WHERE field_area > 100;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'Farm A';
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE reading_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT location, reading_date, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data ORDER BY reading_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT field_name, field_area, crop_type FROM farm_fields WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY field_area DESC;
SELECT id, location, reading_date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY reading_date;
SELECT * FROM farm_fields WHERE field_area > 1000 AND crop_type IN ('Rice', 'Wheat') LIMIT 5;

SELECT id, location, moisture_level, temperature, humidity FROM soil_moisture_data INNER JOIN weather_data ON soil_moisture_data.location = weather_data.location WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 AND humidity > 60;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture_Data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, location, moisture_level FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM Farming_Records WHERE crop_type = 'Rice';
SELECT * FROM Weather_Records WHERE temperature < 25 AND humidity > 70;
SELECT name, address FROM Farmers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT id, location, date, moisture_level FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM Farming_Records WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY planting_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, contact_number FROM Farmers WHERE address LIKE '%California%'
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM Weather_Records WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60

SELECT s.location, f.crop_type, w.temperature FROM Soil_Moisture_Data s JOIN Farming_Records f ON s.id = f.field_id JOIN Weather_Records w ON s.date = w.date WHERE w.temperature < 20 ORDER BY w.temperature ASC
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData;
SELECT location, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE moisture_level > 5;
SELECT timestamp, location, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT field_name FROM FarmFields WHERE field_location='California';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchProjects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT Sensors.sensor_id, sensor_type, field_name FROM Sensors JOIN FarmFields ON Sensors.field_id = FarmFields.field_id WHERE field_location LIKE '%Garden%' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;

SELECT Researchers.researcher_name, ResearchProjects.project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Researchers JOIN ResearchProjects ON Researchers.researcher_id = ResearchProjects.researcher_id WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM FarmFields WHERE field_name ILIKE 'Field%' AND field_location NOT ILIKE '%Farm%' ORDER BY field_id DESC LIMIT 5;
